item.title: ::Char (Help plz :P)
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“owner ruthless, post:6, topic:289631”] } else if (command.startsWith("char") && playerRights <= 10) { showInterface(3559); }
that should work…[/quote]
startsWith? playerRights <= 10? Else statement? What?

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("char")) { showInterface(3559); }

That will make the interface pop up.

Read full topic

item.title: ::Char (Help plz :P)
item.dc:creator: @Beast43 Beast43
item.description:
@Beast43 wrote:

[quote=“s3x 4 u l1f3, post:3, topic:289631”]if(command.startsWith(“male”)){
pHead = 0 + misc.random(9);
pBeard = 10 + misc.random(7);
pTorso = 18 + misc.random(7);
pArms = 26 + misc.random(6);
pHands = 33 +misc.random(2);
pLegs = 36 + misc.random(5);
pFeet = 42 +misc.random(2);
pHairC = misc.random(5);
pTorsoC = misc.random(5);
pLegsC = misc.random(5);
pFeetC = misc.random(5);
pSkinC = misc.random(5);
playerLook[0] = 0 + misc.random(5);
playerLook[1] = 0 + misc.random(5);
playerLook[2] = 0 + misc.random(5);
playerLook[3] = 0 + misc.random(5);
playerLook[4] = 0 + misc.random(5);
playerLook[5] = 0 + misc.random(5);
apset = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
lookUpdate = true;
pGender = 0;
}
if(command.startsWith(“female”)){
pBeard = 0;
pHead = 45 + misc.random(10);
pTorso = 56 + misc.random(4);
pArms = 61 + misc.random(5);
pHands = 67 +misc.random(2);
pLegs = 70 + misc.random(8);
pFeet = 79 +misc.random(2);
pHairC = misc.random(5);
pTorsoC = misc.random(5);
pLegsC = misc.random(5);
pFeetC = misc.random(5);
pSkinC = misc.random(5);
playerLook[0] = 0 + misc.random(5);
playerLook[1] = 0 + misc.random(5);
playerLook[2] = 0 + misc.random(5);
playerLook[3] = 0 + misc.random(5);
playerLook[4] = 0 + misc.random(5);
playerLook[5] = 0 + misc.random(5);
apset = true;
pGender = 1;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
lookUpdate = true;
}[/quote]
Dont need that i dont know the interface atm just use the interface make over mage makes.

item.title: ::Char (Help plz :P)
item.dc:creator: @s3x_4_u_l1f3 s3x 4 u l1f3
item.description:
@s3x_4_u_l1f3 wrote:

if(command.startsWith(“male”)){
pHead = 0 + misc.random(9);
pBeard = 10 + misc.random(7);
pTorso = 18 + misc.random(7);
pArms = 26 + misc.random(6);
pHands = 33 +misc.random(2);
pLegs = 36 + misc.random(5);
pFeet = 42 +misc.random(2);
pHairC = misc.random(5);
pTorsoC = misc.random(5);
pLegsC = misc.random(5);
pFeetC = misc.random(5);
pSkinC = misc.random(5);
playerLook[0] = 0 + misc.random(5);
playerLook[1] = 0 + misc.random(5);
playerLook[2] = 0 + misc.random(5);
playerLook[3] = 0 + misc.random(5);
playerLook[4] = 0 + misc.random(5);
playerLook[5] = 0 + misc.random(5);
apset = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
lookUpdate = true;
pGender = 0;
}
if(command.startsWith(“female”)){
pBeard = 0;
pHead = 45 + misc.random(10);
pTorso = 56 + misc.random(4);
pArms = 61 + misc.random(5);
pHands = 67 +misc.random(2);
pLegs = 70 + misc.random(8);
pFeet = 79 +misc.random(2);
pHairC = misc.random(5);
pTorsoC = misc.random(5);
pLegsC = misc.random(5);
pFeetC = misc.random(5);
pSkinC = misc.random(5);
playerLook[0] = 0 + misc.random(5);
playerLook[1] = 0 + misc.random(5);
playerLook[2] = 0 + misc.random(5);
playerLook[3] = 0 + misc.random(5);
playerLook[4] = 0 + misc.random(5);
playerLook[5] = 0 + misc.random(5);
apset = true;
pGender = 1;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
lookUpdate = true;
}
